comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Is this the the same fellow as - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3129858362/ www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3093479879/ www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3169117294/ (in front), and here - www.powerhousemuseum.com/collection/database/?irn=386860&... . This last image, which I think is not yet on Flickr, has the date "1896" on the rock just below his right leg.
